title: Sales Development Representative
description:
Hello, we‚Äôre Instrumentl.
We‚Äôre a mission-driven startup helping the nonprofit sector to drive impact, and we‚Äôre well on our way to becoming the #1 most-loved grant discovery and management tool. To help us get there, we‚Äôre hiring a remote Sales Development Representative to represent Instrumentl to prospective clients.

About us: 
Instrumentl is a hyper-growth YC-backed startup with over 3,000 nonprofit clients, from local homeless shelters to larger organizations like the San Diego Zoo and the University of Alaska. We are building the future of fundraising automation, helping nonprofits to discover, track, and manage grants efficiently through our SaaS platform.

Our charts are dramatically up-and-to-the-right üìà ‚Äî we‚Äôre cash flow positive and doubling year-over-year, with customers who love us (NPS is 65+ and Ellis PMF survey is 60+). Join us on this rocket ship to Mars!

About the role:
In this role, you‚Äôll be helping organizations big and small get access to more resources so they can grow their impact.

Over the past year, we‚Äôve seen great results reaching out to universities and non-profits to let them know about Instrumentl, and now we are growing a dedicated team to scale this effort.  We are looking for someone who loves the idea of spending all day on the phone with non-profits and universities.  

But, we‚Äôre not just looking for a typical sales rep. We are looking for someone who wants to build a sales career and do good at the same time. 

This role is perfect for a sales professional early on in their career, or someone looking to career switch into sales, that wants to help some of the best organizations in the world.  

The Instrumentl team is fully distributed (read: no office!).

Get to know us at instrumentl.com/about!

title: Creative Strategist
description:
About This Role

Tumblr is looking for a socially savvy Creative Strategist who can translate the conversations, trends, and creative aesthetics of the platform into storytelling. To succeed, you‚Äôll need a healthy mix of curiosity, collaboration, and creativity.
You will be part of a team focused on driving direct revenue via advertiser partnerships that leverage Tumblr‚Äôs unique audience, media solutions, Creatrs network, marketing initiatives, and new product offerings (ie. Merch, digital goods, Communities).¬†As a Creative Strategist, you will help our team, our prospects, and our advertisers better understand the Tumblr audience and position Tumblr to agency and brand advertisers as a must-buy.

Who You Are:¬†
  • Deep knowledge of Tumblr, internet culture, and social media trends.¬†
  • Are tapped into where internet culture meets digital marketing, and can effectively communicate the unique value of Tumblr to our brand partners and their agencies.¬†
  • 5-8 years experience in creative strategy roles within social media, and/or agencies and/or creative studios.¬†
  • Able to navigate creative tools keynote/slides, Photoshop, gif/video editing.
  • Strong written and visual communication skills. You excel at creating compelling audience stories, with insights, observations, and lived experiences
  • Creative, flexible, and with a growth mindset. You are comfortable showing your work-in-progress, and welcome creative feedback to help you land on the best ideas.
  • Strong and deadline focused multitasker, who can manage your own work while never passing up an opportunity to help out a colleague
  • Are comfortable working in a fast-moving and evolving environment.

Primary responsibilities:

  • Create both big ideas and creative tactics that tap into audience behaviors and trends, while delivering against the advertiser brief.
  • Build copy and communications that reflect Tumblr‚Äôs unique brand of internet weirdness.¬†
  • Ability to pitch and sell concepts to internal stakeholders and clients.
  • Design decks, assets, and other marketing materials to support sales efforts.
  • Support Account Management in the execution of the creative elements and deliverables of sold campaigns.
  • Work with our Creator Partnerships Manager to oversee the artist selection, concept approval, and creation of custom campaign assets.¬†
  • Support all Brand Partnership efforts to educate the market, and evangelize Tumblr as an effective organic and paid media channel for brand advertisers.¬†

Salary range: $120,000-$180,000 USD.¬† Please note that salary ranges are global, regardless of location, and we pay in local currency.

We are searching for high-caliber candidates with the skills and qualities to have a net positive for Automattic. Pay will reflect the potential contribution and the impact you can bring, which may, in some cases, go beyond the range stated.

This isn‚Äôt your typical work-from-home job‚Äîwe are a fully-remote company with an open vacation policy. Read more about our compensation philosophy. To see a full list of benefits by country, consult our Benefits Page. And check out these links to learn more about How We Hire and What We Expect from Ourselves.



About Automattic¬†

We are the people behind¬†WordPress.com, WooCommerce, Tumblr, Simplenote, Jetpack, Longreads, Day One, Pocket Casts, and more. We believe in making the web a better place.

We‚Äôre a distributed company with more than 1700 Automatticians in 92 countries speaking 110+ different languages. And, even more than growth and profitability (although we‚Äôre plenty profitable), above all, we‚Äôre driven by a mission:¬† We democratize publishing and commerce so anyone with a story can tell it, and anyone with a product can sell it, regardless of income, gender, politics, language, or country.

We believe in Open Source, and the vast majority of our work is available under the¬†GPL.

Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion at Automattic¬†

We‚Äôre improving diversity in the tech industry. At Automattic, we want people to love their work and show respect and empathy to all. We welcome differences and strive to increase participation from traditionally underrepresented groups. Our DEI committee involves Automatticians across the company and drives grassroots change. For example, this group has helped facilitate private online spaces for affiliated Automatticians to gather and helps run a monthly DEI People Lab series for further learning. DEI is a priority at Automattic, though our dedication influences far more than just Automatticians: We make our products freely available and translate our products into and offer customer support in numerous languages. We require unconscious bias training for our hiring teams and ensure our products are accessible across different bandwidths and devices.¬†
